Notes: Increases arcane by 4 for each boss killed at a ruin

Notes: Increases damage negation for self and allies by 12% for 30 seconds after using skill

Notes: Skill inflicts 70 poison. Deals [MaxHP * 0.0025] + 250 damage on poison-afflicted enemies. Testing suggests its still based on max HP

Relic Description: [Duchess] Use Character Skill for Brief Invulnerability
Notes: Makes you immune to damage for 0.4 seconds after using skill. Translates to 24 iframes at 60FPS

Relic Description: [Raider] Hit With Character Skill to Reduce Enemy Attack Power
Notes: Decreases enemy damage dealt by 0.87x after hitting them with skill for 13 seconds

Relic Description: [Executor] Slowly Restore HP upon Ability Activation
Notes: Restores [MaxHP * 0.0027] + 3 for 30 seconds after passive activates (recovering from status effect)
